jobDescription: Responsibilities:  Manage the entire certification process from test lab selection, test preparation, submission for testing, documentation filing, and managing archives of the  certification process.  Guide and perform the agreed upon compliance tests of the wireless equipment in-house, interface and support certification labs.  Provide guidance on the regulatory requirements and keep the engineering team up to date on regulatory changes in the regulatory domains of interest.  Analyze certification results and resolve issues found during the approval process by working closely with engineering.  Understand regulatory requirements (mainly FCC & ETSI) and be familiar with the methods to demonstrate compliance of the radio equipment for wireless  standards such as LTE and WiFi.  Interface with regulatory bodies, study new rules and regulations. Study, support, and adopt innovative design and test approaches.  Monitor and enforce rules and regulations to be sure they are properly followed. Requirements:  Familiarity with international regulatory standards and their approval process. In depth knowledge of the regulatory requirements and how they apply to non-  standardized wireless solutions.  Travel to local certification labs is required5+ years of industry experience specific to wireless products regulatory compliance Master or advanced degree in electrical engineering or close related fields (full-time or consulting position)
